thread.title: Sarathkumar files a case against Vishal
thread.title_full: Sarathkumar files a case against Vishal - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Sarathkumar files a case against Vishal
text:
It was only a week ago that veteran actress Radhika Sarathkumar had accused Pandavar Ani, the group of actors led by actor Vishal, of the allegations on financial mismanagement by her husband and veteran actor Sarath Kumar. Now we hear that the Nadigar Sangam president himself has filed a defamation case against Vishal and senior actor S Ve Shekher for the accusations of getting illegal turnover over a contract to build a mall at the Nadigar Sangam property.
The Sangam elections are due for October 18. The Pandavar Ani is yet to react to both charges- by Radhika and her husband Sarathkumar. Sarathkumar has added that he would not be able to work with those who are against him.
